original_name: The Adventures of Hello Kitty and Friends
plot: The Adventures of Hello Kitty and Friends is a children's CGI-animated television series featuring Hello Kitty and her pals. There are 52 12-minute episodes dealing with themes of friendship, sharing, kindness and family.
plot_en: The Adventures of Hello Kitty and Friends is a children's CGI-animated television series featuring Hello Kitty and her pals. There are 52 12-minute episodes dealing with themes of friendship, sharing, kindness and family.
plot_es: The Adventures of Hello Kitty and Friends is a children's CGI-animated television series featuring Hello Kitty and her pals. There are 52 12-minute episodes dealing with themes of friendship, sharing, kindness and family.
title: The Adventures of Hello Kitty and Friends
